response.overview: A three-part documentary that doesn’t just point the lens at the Lumad struggle—it listens. Tinuod Ug Haom dives deep into the heart of Mindanao, where community organizers fight for land, identity, and justice in the face of relentless human rights violations. Raw, reflective, and grounded in truth, it’s a student project that punches way above its weight—technically, emotionally, and politically.
response.title: Tinuod Ug Haom
